name: A Break (Maybe)
description:
In the same vein as my other projects this is a very small Bitsy Game I tried to make in a couple of hours. I've been just trying to push out idea after idea the last couple of weeks to hopefully get the creative juices flowing and establish a routine in which I can create more often. I hopfe after some time I can then learn more, refine and tweak those ideas. 

But for what it is worth enjoy this little game about a very big topic in my life right now. I wish you all the best.

Made with the incredible Bitsy Game Engine.
